name: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game
overview: Build your deck and face the Dark Forces of Sauron! Battle spiders, orcs, Ringwraiths, and more as you journey through Middle-earth, earning cards and devising new tactics along the way. In The Lord of the Rings: Living Card Game, players lead their own fellowship of heroes through immersive quests, each with its own unique narrative and challenges. Traverse the dark forests of Mirkwood, brave the flames of Mordor, plumb the depths of Moria, and protect the Free Peoples of Middle-earth from the oppressive and all-seeing Eye of Sauron. Ready your weapons, gather your heroes, and create your own story.
